original_text: Then Saul said to his servants, “Seek out for me a woman who is a medium, that I may go to her and inquire of her.” And his servants said to him, “Behold, there is a medium at En-dor.”
korean_text: 사울이 그의 신하들에게 이르되 나를 위하여 신접한 여인을 찾으라 내가 그리로 가서 그에게 물으리라 하니 그의 신하들이 그에게 이르되 보소서 엔돌에 신접한 여인이 있나이다

sentences.original_text: Then Saul said to his servants,
Seek out for me a woman who is a medium,
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 위해 신접한 여자를 하나 찾아내라,

sentences.original_text: that I may go to her
And his servants said to him,
there is a medium at En-dor.”
